trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of instances of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> class supported by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de instâncias da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> compatíveis com o serviço Web XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<binding>` element enclosed by the root `<definitions>` element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> classe corresponde para o WSDL Web Services Description Language () `<binding>` elemento entre pela raiz `<definitions>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre WSDL, consulte a especificação em http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> a adicionar à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> especificado ao final do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where the <paramref name="binding" /> parameter has been added.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero em que o parâmetro <paramref name="binding" /> foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> for which to check collection membership.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> para o qual a associação da coleção é verificada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> is a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> especificado é um membro do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="binding" /> parameter is a member of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o parâmetro <paramref name="binding" /> for um membro do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> serving as the destination for the copy action.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> que funciona como o destino para a ação de cópia.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to start placing the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual começar a posicionar a coleção copiada.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional array of type <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" />, starting at the specified zero-based index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todo o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" /> para uma matriz unidimensional compatível do tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" />, começando no índice de base zero especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> for which to search in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> a ser pesquisado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisa o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> especificado e retorna o índice de base zero da primeira ocorrência dentro de toda a coleção.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro com sinal de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the <c>binding</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual inserir o parâmetro <c>binding</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" /> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> especificado ao <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" /> no índice de base zero especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Se o número de itens na coleção já for igual a capacidade da coleção, a capacidade é duplicada, automaticamente realocando a matriz interna antes do novo elemento é inserido.

trans-unit.source: If the `index` parameter is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, the `binding` parameter is added to the end of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Se o `index` parâmetro for igual ao <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, o `binding` parâmetro é adicionado ao final do <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection>.

trans-unit.source: The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos após o ponto de inserção se mover para baixo para acomodar o novo elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> instance specified by the parameter passed in.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a instância <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> especificada pelo parâmetro no qual ela foi passada.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> whose value is modified or returned.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> cujo valor é modificado ou retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de um <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> no índice de base zero especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Binding" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="index" /> é menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is greater than <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="index" /> é maior que <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> returned.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> specified by its name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um especificado <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> por seu nome.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Binding" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example searches the `Bindings` property of myServiceDescription for a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> named "MathServiceHttpGet".
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir pesquisa o `Bindings` propriedade myServiceDescription para um <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding> denominado "MathServiceHttpGet".

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Remove a primeira ocorrência do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> especificado do <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método executa uma pesquisa linear; Portanto, o tempo médio de execução é proporcional ao <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The elements that follow the removed `Binding` move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos que seguem o removido `Binding` mover para cima para ocupar o ponto vagas.
